description: Bluebear is a peppy, cub villager in the Animal Crossing series. She is named after her color and species, and also the fruit, the blueberry (which relates to her catchphrase, "peach"). Her Japanese name may come from nuigurumi, meaning a stuffed toy. Bluebear also shares her Japanese catchphrase with Megumi, a peppy dog villager from Doubutsu no Mori e+, though Bluebear's is spelled in katakana, while Megumi's is in hiragana.
